title: Hyundai sales rise 9.5 pc to 63,701 units in April
description: Hyundai Motor India's April wholesales grew by 9.5% to 63,701 units, with domestic sales up 1% to 50,201 units. Exports increased by 59% to 13,500 units. SUVs like Creta and Venue were key sales drivers.
